books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An inexperienced college student falls in love with a tortured man who has particular sexual tastes; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A Marine returning home sets out to track down the woman whose photo he found in Iraq.
books.name: THE LUCKY ONE

books.author: by Stieg Larsson
books.description: Volume 3 of the Millennium trilogy, about a Swedish hacker and a journalist.
books.name: THE GIRL WHO KICKED THE HORNET’S NEST

books.author: by William Landay
books.description: An assistant district attorney’s life is shaken when his 14-year-old son is accused of murder.
books.name: DEFENDING JACOB

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: The children of a man who studies wolves must make difficult decisions when he is seriously injured in an accident.
books.name: LONE WOLF

books.author: by Troy Denning
books.description: Jedi and Sith reach the endgame in the finale of the Fate of the Jedi series; a “Star Wars” novel.
books.name: FATE OF THE JEDI: APOCALYPSE

books.author: by James Patterson and Mark Sullivan
books.description: Peter Knight pursues a murderer who is trying to destroy the London Olympics.
books.name: PRIVATE GAMES

books.author: by Kathryn Stockett
books.description: A young white woman and two black maids in 1960s Mississippi.
books.name: THE HELP

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: Former high school sweethearts fall tentatively back into each other’s orbits after more than a decade.
books.name: UNFINISHED BUSINESS

books.author: by Vince Flynn
books.description: Mitch Rapp, a C.I.A. super-agent hunting down perpetrators of the Pan Am Lockerbie bombing, finds himself caught in a dangerous trap.
books.name: KILL SHOT

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: An encounter along a mountain road near Virgin River shakes up the lives of two people: Katie, a single mother, and a sexy biker.
books.name: REDWOOD BEND

books.author: by Chris Pavone
books.description: A burned-out C.I.A. operative encounters personal challenges and political espionage when she moves with her husband to Luxembourg.
books.name: THE EXPATS
